verses.text: Then Jonah prayed unto the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*his God out of the fish’s belly,
And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, andthou heardest my voice.
For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.
Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.
The waters compassed me about, evento the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.
I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars wasabout me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*my God.
When my soul fainted within me I remembered the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.
They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.
But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay thatthat I have vowed. Salvation isof the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
¶ And the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.
